name: Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of Osborne House
name_original: Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of Osborne House
description:
Play as famous detective Sherlock Holmes. Put your brain to the test with a multitude of exciting puzzles and brain-teasers as you lead a brand new investigation specially designed for the Nintendo DS!

Features

• Investigate! Question characters and find clues along the way to help solve this mystery!
• Examine! Gather additional items that will help you on your way.
• Use Your Wits! Solve over 40 exciting puzzles and brain-teasers like, Genealogical Tree and Hidden Card, to reveal unlockable, hidden content.
• Adventure! Choose from 2 different modes— Investigate & Collect or Puzzle Solving.
• Travel! Journey through 40 different environments, like Buckingham Palace and the British Museum and use the interactive map to change locations.
